english.segment1: Take me for a fool and I'll do the same for you. To catch what's coming down I'll repeat myself out loud
english.segment2: Finally I recall all the photographs on the wall. All my friends agree that the latter half is not me
english.segment3: A long time ago I might have been. Tying my hope around you again. But holding me now won't do any good. 'cause I died before I could
english.segment4: Remembering what I've seen takes an awful lot out of me. Some day you might hear an apology that's sincere
english.segment5: A long time ago I might have been. Tying my hope around you again. But holding me now won't do any good. 'cause I died before I could
english.segment6: The pain that's all around could make me it's Home so I call it my own. As sorry as I seem you never could dream what sorry could be
